pullrequest.title: Separate TimePanel's display into TimeWidget and LogPlayWidget

content.raw:
Sorry for that, I didn't give this widget much attention because right now it is just a place holder for the new widget. I figured that leaving it as similar as possible to TimeWidget would make review easier, but apparently it makes some things too complicated.

So now I've changed LogPlayWidget to look closer to what it will be once we have the whole back-end implemented e553888 Note that it directly triggers actions like `g_playAct`, which I'm not sure it's a good idea.

It now looks like this:

![logplaywidget1.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/3091080327-logplaywidget1.png)
content.html:
Sorry for that, I didn't give this widget much attention because right now it is just a place holder for the new widget. I figured that leaving it as similar as possible to TimeWidget would make review easier, but apparently it makes some things too complicated.

So now I've changed LogPlayWidget to look closer to what it will be once we have the whole back-end implemented e553888 Note that it directly triggers actions like g_playAct, which I'm not sure it's a good idea.
